name: counter
description: 1. Using Express, write a server that implements a counter. (You may use the counter server you implemented from previous classes). 1. Create a /public subfolder, and use express.static() to server a website from /public 1. Implement a Counter website (keep the UI simple!) 1. Users on your Counter website should be able to:     1. Increment the counter     1. Decrement the counter     1. Reset the counter to 0 1. This is just a client side app! Nothing is syncing with the server. Add an API to the express server that will update the data on the server.
